metadata.title: Conversation 4
metadata.recording: Conversation recorded on participant's iPhone (regular compressed audio, not lossless)
metadata.context: The participants are at the table in their home, chatting after school.
metadata.rights: Restricted access: Creators allow academic use.
metadata.sponsors: Uyghur Projects Foundation; UCSB Confucius Institute China Studies Award 2021 (Michael Fiddler); UCSB Humanities and Social Sciences Research Grant 2022 (Michael Fiddler)

speaker_A.comment: Speaker A wishes for all personal information to remain confidential

speaker_B.comment: Speaker B wishes for all personal information to remain confidential

annotation.eng: You’re not feeling good, are you, baby?

annotation.iu: Balam ukangning mijezi yoq, sen ukanggha néme ish qilip béreleysen balam.
annotation.seg: bala-m uka-ng-ning mijez-i yoq sen uka-ng-gha néme ish qil-ip bér-ele-y-sen bala-m
annotation.gloss: child-1SG.POSS younger.brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-GEN feeling-3POSS not.exist 2SG.INFM younger brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-DAT what thing do-CVB AUX.ber-ABIL-PRES-2SG.INF child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: Child, your little brother isn’t feeling good, what can you do for your brother, child?

annotation.iu: Séning mijezing yoq waqtingda, biz dada ikkimiz séni néme déseng he dep qip bérimizghu.
annotation.seg: séning mijez-ing yoq waqt-ing-da biz dada ikki-miz séni néme dé-se-ng he de-p qi-p bér-i-miz-ghu
annotation.gloss: 2SG.INF.GEN feeling-2SG.INFM.POSS not.exist time-2SG.INFM.POSS-LOC 1PL dad two-1PL 1SG.INF.ACC what say-COND-IMP.2SG.POL DM say-CVB do-CVB AUX.ber-PRES-1PL-CONF
annotation.eng: When you aren’t feeling good, your dad and I can do whatever you say.

annotation.iu: Sen «a yerim aghridi miyerim aghridi» dep déyeleysenghu.
annotation.seg: sen a yer-im aghri-d-i miyer-im aghri-d-i de-p déy-ele-y-sen-ghu
annotation.gloss: 2SG.INFM that place-1SG.POSS hurt-PST-3 here-1SG.POSS hurt-PST-3 say-CVB say-ABIL-PRES-2SG.INFM-CONF
annotation.eng: You can say “It hurts here, it hurts there.”
But since your little brother can’t talk yet [xxx] [xxx]
All he can do is cry,
and besides that he’s got a fever now.

annotation.iu: Sen ukanggha néme ish qip béreleysen balam?
annotation.seg: sen uka-ng-gha néme ish qi-p bér-ele-y-sen bala-m
annotation.gloss: 2SG.INFM younger.brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-DAT what thing do-CVB AUX.ber-ABIL-PRES-2SG.INFM child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: What can you do for your brother, child?

annotation.iu: «Doxturgha bar-- barsun» dep advice qilimen men.
annotation.seg: doxtur-gha bar-- bar-sun de-p EN:advice qil-i-men men
annotation.eng: My advice is, “Let him go to the doctor”
Look, if we want to go to the doctor…

annotation.iu: Doxturgha barsang birinchi bolup u yerde uzun öchret saqlaysen.
annotation.seg: doxtur-gha bar-sa-ng bir-inchi bol-up u yer-de uzun öchret saqla-y-sen
annotation.gloss: doctor-DAT go-COND-IMP.2SG.POL one-ORD be-CVB that place-LOC long line wait-PRES-2SG.INF
annotation.eng: If you go to the doctor, the first thing you have to do is wait for a long time.

annotation.iu: her xil késeller bar u yerde.
annotation.seg: her xil késel-ler bar u yer-de
annotation.gloss: every type disease-PL exist that place-LOC

annotation.iu: Uning üstige ukangni «tekshürimiz» dep bek tola yighlitiwétidiken.
annotation.seg: u-ning üst-i-ge uka-ng-ni tekshür-i-miz de-p bek tola yighlit-iwét-i-diken
annotation.gloss: that-GEN top-3POSS-DAT younger.brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-ACC check-PRES-1PL say-CVB very much cry-CAUS-INTENS-PRES-EVID
annotation.eng: Besides that, if they decide they need to check your brother they’ll make him cry a lot.
What else can you do, child?

annotation.iu: Miyerge kéle men sanga gep qilay balam.
annotation.seg: miyer-ge kél-e men sanga gep qil-ay bala-m
annotation.eng: Hey, come here, child, I’m talking to you.

annotation.iu: Ma-- némini téléwini körmiseng öchüriwéte balam.
annotation.seg: ma némi-ni téléwi-ni kör-mi-se-ng öch-ür-iwét-e bala-m
annotation.gloss: this what-ACC TV-ACC see-NEG-COND-2SG.INFM turn.off-CAUS-INTENS-DM child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: This—thing, this TV, if you’re not going to watch it, turn it off.
Did you turn off the TV?

annotation.iu: Üch minuttin kéyin öchidu demdu awu, qara?
annotation.seg: üch minut-tin kéyin öch-i-du de-am-du awu qara
annotation.gloss: three minute-ABL after turn.off-PRES-3 say-INT-3 that look
annotation.eng: Look, give it a break, it’s going off in three minutes.
Child, have you finished your homework from school?
It’s been done for a month.
Also, do you want me to, uh,

annotation.iu: bir néme yasaydighanni rejistér qip bersem,
annotation.seg: bir néme yasa-ydighan-ni rejistér qi-p ber-se-m
annotation.gloss: one what create-PTCP.PRES-ACC register do-CVB AUX.ber-COND-1SG
annotation.eng: register you for that creation thing, whatever it was,
that thing you bring home and create,
are you going to do it or no?
If you want to do it,

annotation.iu: Uningdinkin mawu shenbe künichu balam Home Depot-qa barsaq héliqi,
annotation.seg: u-ning-dinkin mawu shenbe kün-i-chu bala-m EN:Home EN:Depot-qa bar-sa-q héliqi
annotation.gloss: that-GEN-since this Saturday day-3POSS-TOP child-1SG.POSS EN:Home EN:Depot-DAT go-COND-1PL that
annotation.eng: And what about that…on Saturday, if we go to Home Depot,

annotation.iu: Ashu mushu shenbe küni bar balam.
annotation.seg: ashu mushu shenbe kün-i bar bala-m
annotation.gloss: that this Saturday day-3POSS exist child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: They’ll have it this Saturday, child.
Do you want to do that too?

annotation.iu: [xxx] a kiyimingmu bek meynet bop kétiptu sewetkin yuyup bérey bolamda?
annotation.seg: [xxx] a kiyim-ing-mu bek meynet bo-p két-ipt-du se-wet-kin yuy-up bér-ey bol-am-du-a
annotation.gloss: [xxx] that clothing-2SG.INFM.POSS-INT very dirty be-CVB AUX.ket-PST.EVID-3 put-INTENS-INFM.IMP wash-CVB give-OPT.1SG be-INT-3-DM
annotation.eng: [xxx] your clothes are all dirty, take them off and let me wash them for you, ok?
Your hair is getting so long, child.
Should we get you a haircut today?

annotation.iu: Men késip qoyaymu ya satrachxanigha apirip kesküzeylimu?
annotation.seg: men kés-ip qoy-ay-mu ya satrachxani-gha apir-ip kes-küz-eyli-mu-i-mu
annotation.gloss: 1SG cut-CVB put-OPT.1SG-INT or barbershop-DAT take-CVB cut-CAUS-OPT.1PL-INT-PRES-INT
annotation.eng: Should I cut it or should we take you to the barbershop and get it cut there?

annotation.iu: men késip qoyimen ya bolmisa satrachxanigha apirimiz.
annotation.seg: men kés-ip qoy-i-men ya bol-mi-sa satrachxani-gha apir-i-miz
annotation.gloss: 1SG cut-CVB put-PRES-1SG or be-NEG-COND barbershop-DAT take-PRES-1PL
annotation.eng: I can cut it for you, otherwise we can take you to the barbershop.
I want to go to the barbershop.
Come here, let me take a look at your hair.
I want to go to the barbershop!

annotation.iu: Miyerge kéle men körüp baqay chéchingni,
annotation.seg: miyer-ge kél-e men kör-üp baq-ay chéch-ing-ni
annotation.eng: Come here and let me take a look at your hair,
Wow, your hair has gotten long, child,

annotation.iu: bu chachning astida yashawatqan bir-- héliqichu,
annotation.seg: bu chach-ning ast-i-da yasha-watqan bir héliqi-chu
annotation.gloss: this hair-GEN underneath-3POSS-LOC live-PTCP.CONT one that-TOP
annotation.eng: there’s something living under your hair—
uh, the hair on your head, [xxx] [xxx]

annotation.iu: kigiz bilen béshinggha ornutup qoyghan ademdekla bop qapsen balam.
annotation.seg: kigiz bilen bésh-ing-gha orni-t-ip qoy-ghan adem-dek-la bo-p qa-p-sen bala-m
annotation.gloss: carpet with head-2SG.INFM.POSS-DAT be.placed-CAUS-CVB AUX.qoy-PTCP.PST person-SIM-just become-CVB AUX.qal-CVB-2SG.INF child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: you look like a person with a felt carpet stuck on your head, child.

annotation.iu: In twenty-five years ademler özini chéchinimu kesmey ashtaq qip baqqanlar bar.
annotation.seg: EN:in EN:twenty-five EN:years adem-ler öz-i-ni chéch-i-ni-mu kes-mey ashtaq qi-p baq-qan-lar bar
annotation.gloss: EN:in EN:twenty-five EN:years person-PL self-3POSS-ACC hair-3POSS-ACC-INT cut-CVB.NEG thus do-CVB AUX.baq-PTCP.PST-PL exist
annotation.eng: 25 years ago there were people who made their hair like this, never cutting it.

annotation.iu: Sen ashtaq twenty-five years-ning aldida yashawatqan ademma emise?
annotation.seg: sen ashtaq EN:twenty-five EN:years-ning ald-i-da yasha-watqan adem-mu emise
annotation.gloss: 2SG.INFM thus EN:twenty-five EN:years-GEN front-3POSS-LOC live-PTCP.CONT person-INT well
annotation.eng: So you’re a person living 25 years in the past, huh?

annotation.iu: Sen hazir bu twenty-first century-da yashawatqan ademghu balam?
annotation.seg: sen hazir bu EN:twenty-first EN:century-da yasha-watqan adem-ghu bala-m
annotation.gloss: 2SG.INFM now this EN:twenty-first EN:century-LOC live-PTCP.CONT person-CONF child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: I think you’re a person living in the 21st century here, child.

annotation.iu: Yaq balam sel bolmaptu bu chéching bek ösüp kétiptu balam.
annotation.seg: yaq bala-m sel bol-ma-pt-u bu chéch-ing bek ös-üp két-ipt-u bala-m
annotation.gloss: no child-1SG.POSS a.bit be-NEG-PST.EVID-3 this hair-2SG.INFM.POSS very grow-CVB AUX.ket-PST.EVID-3 child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: No that’s not going to work, child, your hair has gotten so long.

annotation.iu: Ukangning mijezi yoq turup ashu sugha chilap turup chéchini alsam jim olturup berdi balam.
annotation.seg: uka-ng-ning mijez-i yoq tur-up ashu su-gha chila-p tur-up chéch-i-ni al-sa-m jim oltur-up ber-d-i bala-m
annotation.gloss: younger.brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-GEN feeling-3POSS not.exist AUX.tur-CVB that water-DAT dip-CVB AUX.tur-CVB hair-3POSS-ACC take-COND-1SG quiet sit-CVB AUX.ber-PST-3 child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: When your brother wasn’t feeling good, he sat quietly while I soaked his hair in water and cut it, child.

annotation.iu: Sen a yerde jim olturup berseng men alaymu ya?
annotation.seg: sen a yer-de jim oltur-up ber-se-ng men al-ay-mu ya
annotation.gloss: 2SG.INFM that place-LOC quiet sit-CVB AUX.ber-COND-2SG.INFM 1SG take-OPT.1SG-INT or
annotation.eng: You sit here quietly and I’ll cut yours.

annotation.iu: Miyege kéle men sanga gep qilay.
annotation.seg: miye-ge kél-e men sanga gep qil-ay
annotation.eng: Come here and let me talk to you.
I want to go to the barbershop.

annotation.iu: Satrachxanigha barsang ma yerdiki chachlar ma yeringge chüshüp ketse qichiship ketti dep héliqi [xxx] qaqshima.
annotation.seg: satrachxani-gha bar-sa-ng ma yer-diki chach-lar ma yer-ing-ge chüsh-üp ket-se qichish-ip ket-t-i de-p héliqi [xxx] qaqshi-ma
annotation.gloss: barbershop-DAT go-COND-2SG.INFM this place-LOC.REL hair-PL this place-2SG.INFM.POSS-DAT go.down-CVB AUX.ket-COND tickle-CVB AUX.ket-PST-3 say-CVB that [xxx] groan-NEG
annotation.eng: If you go to the barbershop, don’t complain if the hair falls somewhere on you and makes you itchy [xxx]

annotation.iu: [xxx], let me see what’s on your thumb.
annotation.seg: [xxx] EN:let EN:me EN:see EN:what's EN:on EN:your EN:thumb
annotation.gloss: [xxx] EN:let EN:me EN:see EN:what's EN:on EN:your EN:thumb
annotation.eng: [xxx], let me see what’s on your thumb.

annotation.iu: Undaq bolsa bügün chüshtin kéyin sel aldirash balam.
annotation.seg: undaq bol-sa bügün chüsh-tin kéyin sel aldirash bala-m
annotation.gloss: thus be-COND today noon-ABL after a.bit busy child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: In that case, I’m a little busy this afternoon, child.

annotation.iu: he etimu belkim aldirash bolushi mumkin dadang,
annotation.seg: he eti-mu belkim aldirash bol-ush-i mumkin dada-ng
annotation.gloss: uh tomorrow-also maybe busy be-GER-3POSS possible dad-2SG.INFM
annotation.eng: uh, tomorrow your dad might be busy too,
for the day after tomorrow until we take you,

annotation.iu: Ma ukanggha bir dem gep qile balam.
annotation.seg: ma uka-ng-gha bir dem gep qil-e bala-m
annotation.gloss: this younger.brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-DAT one rest speech do-dm child-1SSG.POSS
annotation.eng: Talk to your brother for a bit, child.
he doesn’t do that for any of us.

annotation.iu: yéqinda oqughan kitabliringni dep baqe manga,
annotation.seg: yéqin-da oqu-ghan kitablir-ing-ni de-p baq-e manga
annotation.eng: tell me about those books you’ve been reading recently,
have you been reading every day or not?

annotation.iu: library-da hold qip qoyghan kitabliring abaytin keptiken balam,
annotation.seg: EN:library-da EN:hold qi-p qoy-ghan kitab-lir-ing abaytin ke-pt-iken bala-m
annotation.gloss: EN:library-LOC EN:hold do-CVB put-PTCP.PST book-PL-2SG.INFM.POSS recently come-PST.EVID-EVID child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: those books you put on hold at the library came in recently, child,
Looks like you got some good books.
You got books about Hiroshima, huh?

annotation.iu: He, qandaq bolup u kitabni élish xiyalinggha kep qaldi balam?
annotation.seg: he qandaq bol-up u kitab-ni él-ish xiyal-ing-gha ke-p qal-d-i bala-m
annotation.gloss: uh how be-CVB that book-ACC take-GER thought-2SG.INFM-DAT come-CVB remain-PST-3 child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: Hm, what made you think to get that book, child?
[xxx] some books I hadn’t read before,
I just decided to check it out.

annotation.iu: Yaq, u-- u isim qandaq ésingge keldi deymen,
annotation.seg: yaq u-- u isim qandaq és-ing-ge kel-d-i de-y-men
annotation.gloss: no * that name how mind-2SG.INFM-DAT come-PST-PRES say-PRES-1SG
annotation.eng: No, I mean how did its name come to your mind,
when you were putting a hold on books for your homework,

annotation.iu: qandaq ashu isim ésingge kep qaldi?
annotation.seg: qandaq ashu isim és-ing-ge ke-p qal-d-i
annotation.gloss: how that name mind-2SG.INFM.POSS-DAT come-CVB AUX.qal-PST-3
annotation.eng: how did that name come to mind?

annotation.iu: Every time alghum keldi ashuni so...
annotation.seg: EN:every EN:time al-ghu-m kel-d-i ashu-ni EN:so
annotation.gloss: EN:every EN:time take-DESID-1SG.POSS come-PST-3 that-ACC EN:so
annotation.eng: Every time I wanted to get it, so…

annotation.iu: He birsige ashu kitabni apsen, andin kéyin yene bashqa kitablarmu barken,
annotation.seg: he bir-si-ge ashu kitab-ni a-p-sen andin kéyin yene bashqa kitab-lar-mu bar-ken
annotation.gloss: uh one-3POSS-DAT that book-ACC take-CVB-2SG.INF then after again other book-PL-INT exist-EVID
annotation.eng: Uh, so you just got that one book, and then there were also some more books later,

annotation.iu: ésimde qalmaptu hazir, üchmu töttek kitabken.
annotation.seg: és-im-de qal-ma-pt-du hazir üch-mu töt-tek kitab-ken
annotation.gloss: mind-1SG.POSS-LOC remain-NEG-PST.EVID-3 now three-INT four-SIM book-EVID
annotation.eng: I can’t remember now, three or four books I think.
How many books did you get altogether?

annotation.iu: Chüshtichu balam néme tamaq yégüng bar?
annotation.seg: chüsh-ti-chu bala-m néme tamaq yé-gü-ng bar
annotation.gloss: noon-LOC-TOP child-1SG.POSS what meal eat-DESID-2SG.INFM.POSS exist
annotation.eng: And for lunch, child, what do you want to eat?

annotation.iu: Sangza dégen tamaq emes balam u,
annotation.seg: sangza dé-gen tamaq emes bala-m u

annotation.iu: héyt bolghan waqitlarda munda jozigha tizip qoyidighanchu,
annotation.seg: héyt bol-ghan waqit-lar-da munda jozi-gha tüz-üp qoy-idighan-chu
annotation.gloss: Eid be-PTCP.PST time-PL-LOC thus table-DAT arrange-CVB AUX.qoy-PTCP.PRES-TOP
annotation.eng: that’s the thing we put on the table during Eid celebrations,
You could think of it as a snack.
It’s not Eid yet, Ramadan is coming,
[xxx] we’ve got a bit of time left until Ramadan still.
At what age do people start fasting?

annotation.iu: He, awu kimler toqquz yash waqtidin bashlapla roza tutup.
annotation.seg: he awu kim-ler toqquz yash waqt-i-din bashla-p-la roza tut-up
annotation.gloss: uh that who-PL nine young time-3-ABL begin-CVB-just fasting restrain-CVB
annotation.eng: Uh, those kids started fasting when they were nine years old.
Why are you knocking your brother over?

annotation.iu: Hey it’s not my fault I tripped,
annotation.seg: EN:hey EN:it's EN:not EN:my EN:fault EN:I EN:tripped
annotation.gloss: EN:hey EN:it's EN:not EN:my EN:fault EN:I EN:tripped
annotation.eng: Hey it’s not my fault I tripped,

annotation.iu: Ukangning mijezi yoq balam, ésingde tut he balam he?
annotation.seg: uka-ng-ning mijez-i yoq bala-m és-ing-de tut he bala-m he
annotation.gloss: younger.brother-2SG.INFM.POSS-GEN feeling-3POSS not.exist child-1SG.POSS mind-2SG.INFM.POSS-LOC hold DM child-1SG.POSS DM
annotation.eng: Your brother’s not feeling good, child, can you please keep that in mind, child, huh?
[xxx] don’t be upset, don’t be upset [xxx].
that neighbor we used to have?

annotation.iu: Ashular shu toqquz yash waqtida tutuptikentuq ashu chaghda,
annotation.seg: ashu-lar shu toqquz yash waqt-i-da tut-upt-iken-tuq ashu chagh-da
annotation.gloss: that-PL that nine young time-3POSS-LOC hold-PST.EVID-EVID-?? that time-LOC
annotation.eng: When they were nine years old they fasted that time,
they didn’t eat during the day.
Do you want to try it this time?

annotation.iu: kün chiqishtin burun tamaq yewalisen, he.
annotation.seg: kün chiq-ish-tin burun tamaq ye-wal-i-sen he
annotation.gloss: day go.up-GER-ABL before meal eat-SELF.BEN-PRES-2SG.INF DM
annotation.eng: you can eat before the sun comes up.
Well, that’s not a real meal,
but anyway, you eat a good breakfast,

annotation.iu: uningdin kéyin bir kün ettigen yaxshichu--
annotation.seg: u-ning-din kéyin bir kün ettigen yaxshi-chu
annotation.gloss: that-GEN-ABL after one day morning good-TOP
annotation.eng: and after that the morning is good—
Ok then I’m not going to do it.
You’re not going to just give it one trial?
I’ll do it when I’m 85 then.
You won’t be able to handle it then either.

annotation.iu: Qérip kétip qorsiqing ittik achidighan bop kétidu.
annotation.seg: qéri-p két-ip qorsiq-ing ittik ach-idighan bo-p két-i-du
annotation.gloss: grow.old-CVB AUX.ket-CVB stomach-2SG.INFM.POSS quickly be.empty-PTCP.PRES be-CVB AUX.ket-PRES-3
annotation.eng: When you’re old you get hungry quickly.
It’s good for your health, child,

annotation.iu: Balam emdi, azraq waqit oquwetkendin kéyinlamchu,
annotation.seg: bala-m emdi azraq waqit oqu-wet-ken-din kéyin-lam-chu
annotation.gloss: child-1SG.POSS now a.little time study-INTENS-PTCP.PST-ABL after-just-TOP
annotation.eng: Anyway, child, after just a bit more school,

annotation.iu: tetilge bek uzun tetilge chiqip kétisen balam,
annotation.seg: tetil-ge bek uzun tetil-ge chiq-ip két-i-sen bala-m
annotation.gloss: vacation-DAT very long vacation-DAT go.up-CVB AUX.ket-PRES-2SG.INF child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: you’ll go on vacation, a really long vacation,

annotation.iu: Yazliq tetil tügigendin kéyin sen üchinchi sinipqa chiqisen balam.
annotation.seg: yaz-liq tetil tügi-gen-din kéyin sen üch-inchi sinip-qa chiq-i-sen bala-m
annotation.gloss: summer-DER vacation end-PTCP.PST-ABL after 2SG.INFM three-ORD class-DAT go.up-PRES-2SG.INF child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: After summer vacation ends, you’ll start third grade, child.

annotation.iu: Üchinchi sinipqa chiqsang awu mektepke bérip oqushni tallamduq yaki bolmisa öyde olturup oqamsen zoom-da?
annotation.seg: üch-inchi sinip-qa chiq-sa-ng awu mektep-ke bér-ip oqu-sh-ni talla-am-d-uq yaki bol-mi-sa öy-de oltur-up oq-am-sen zum-da
annotation.gloss: three-ORD class-DAT go.up-COND-2SG.INFM.POSS that school-DAT go-CVB study-GER-ACC choose-INT-PST-1PL or be-NEG-COND home-LOC sit-CVB study-INT-2SG.INFM Zoom-LOC
annotation.eng: When you start third grade are we going to choose in-person class or remote learning on Zoom?
We’re going to choose Zoom again?
You’re tired of the computer, huh kiddo?
You’ve been playing too many video games, huh?
But, there will be a different teacher.
it’ll be a different teacher now.
there was one book you read, child.

annotation.iu: Nechche waqitning yaqi taza aldirash waqtimda sözlep kétetting,
annotation.seg: nechche waqit-ning yaq-i taza aldirash waqt-im-da sözle-p két-et-ti-ng
annotation.gloss: some time-GEN side-3POSS absolutely busy time-1SG.POSS-LOC speak-CVB AUX.ket-PST.HAB-XPST-2SG.INFM.POSS
annotation.eng: A while ago you kept talking about it when I was really busy,

annotation.iu: Hazir mushta chaghda sözlep bére hazir men bikar bolghandinkin balam.
annotation.seg: hazir mushta chagh-da sözle-p bér-e hazir men bikar bol-ghan-dinkin bala-m
annotation.gloss: now thus time-LOC speak-CVB AUX.ber-DM now 1SG free be-PTCP.PST-since child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: Now you can tell me about what you read then since I’m free now, child.

annotation.iu: Oqughan yaxshi kitabliringni «apa apa, apa apa, mani dep bérey sanga» dep taza aldirash waqtimda dep kétetting balam.
annotation.seg: oqu-ghan yaxshi kitab-lir-ing-ni apa apa apa apa ma-ni de-p bér-ey sanga de-p taza aldirash waqt-im-da de-p két-et-ti-ng bala-m
annotation.gloss: study-PTCP.PST good book-PL-2SG.INFM.POSS-ACC mom mom mom mom this-ACC say-CVB give-OPT.1SG 2SG.INF.DAT say-CVB absolutely busy time-1SG.POSS-LOC say-CVB AUX.ket-PST.HAB-XPST-2SG.INFM.POSS child-1SG.POSS
annotation.eng: You would always say, “Mom, mom, mom let me tell you about this great book I read” when I was really busy, child.
You can tell me about it now.
I don’t want to tell you about it.
When I wanted to make you tell--
when I wanted to tell you you didn’t let me so…

annotation.iu: U chaghlarda men aldirash tursam balam.
annotation.seg: u chagh-lar-da men aldirash tur-sa-m bala-m
annotation.eng: I was busy at those times, child.
Now I want to sit and listen to you.
